------=_NextPart_000_041C_01C1B42A.F4319200
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

The Insecticons stand before the Chivtron base. Some western music plays. I=
n fact, it's Clint Eastwood music. Barrage is reloading his huge rifle slow=
ly, putting in one exploding shell at a time. His eyes are on his work, not=
 the base. Chop Shop was kneeling down and moving a finger slowly back and =
forth through the dirt on the ground, drawing a picture of something that d=
idn't look like anything. Shrapnel and Bombshell were bickering about grena=
des, it was indistinct, as they were in the background while the camera foc=
used on Kickback, who was kicking a rock around with his hind legs in beast=
 mode. Ransack, meanwhile, was holding a square shaped bomb in his palm. He=
 slowly raised his hand, and pressed the button. He threw the charge. It la=
nded on (or next to) the Chivtron base. The timer started counting down tow=
ards zero one second at a time. Ransack stands, in a pose, and watches the =
timer tick down as he backs away a few steps. He raises a shield in front o=
f himself to shield himself from any shrapnel. No, not my character, the de=
bris from explosions, and stuff.

Venom: Take cover, Insecticons.

The Inse=
cticons all back away, except for Ransack, who stood close and held his shi=
eld up. Not close enough to be caught in the explosion, but alot closer tha=
n the other Insecticons were standing...
